attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Save the special care baby unit at the Royal Glamorgan Hospital, Llantrisant, Rhondda Cynon Taff. neo natal intensive care unit. Submitted by Helen Jackson, Chairperson, Cardiff Twins & Multiple Births Club
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
